game.name: Ceville
game.shortDescription: The mean cruel cold blooded tyrant Ceville ruthlessly rules the beautiful kingdom of Faeryanis. Or rather, he used to rule the beautiful kingdom of Faeryanis, until the brave people revolted against his regime and drove him out of the palace.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The mean cruel cold blooded tyrant Ceville ruthlessly rules the beautiful kingdom of Faeryanis. Or rather, he used to rule the beautiful kingdom of Faeryanis, until the brave people revolted against his regime and drove him out of the palace.

reviewHighlights.text: 알트탭 버그가 있다. 공략 봐가면서 할려고 알트탭을 자주 누르니까 게임이 멈춘다. 로딩도 잦고 최적화도 엉망이다.
나름 호평을 받은 어드벤처 게임. 개인적으로는 취향에 안 맞아서 시작 후 5분 만에 잊어버렸다. 아아…….
